mapper.select: SELECT A.*, C.HERO_NAME, D.GM_STAR_CODE FROM GM_USER_HERO A LEFT JOIN GM_HERO_STAR B ON A.GM_HERO_STAR_ID = B.GM_HERO_STAR_ID LEFT JOIN GM_HERO_INFO C ON B.GM_HERO_ID = C.HERO_ID LEFT JOIN GM_STAR_INFO D ON B.GM_STAR_ID = D.GM_STAR_ID WHERE A.`STATUS` = '1' AND A.MINT_HASH = #{mintHash}
